name: Totally Just a Normal Pong
description:
Totally Just a Normal Pong

This is obviously a normal pong game. You should definitely play it just like a pong.

Don't try to go where you shouldn't be.

Controls
  • Arrows - Control Paddle
  • Space - Launch Ball and..   Jump?..     Shoot?! Really?
  • Mouse - Select Options..?
Credits
  • Leandro Satoshi - Music and SFX
  • Abner Santos - Art and Programming
  • Henrique Camillo - Programming

This game was made in 48 hours for Geleia Jam:  O Retorno, in which theme was "You can 「not」 do that".
